Name: Agriculture
Effect 0: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and score a card of value one higher than the card you returned.

Name: Archery
Effect 0: I DEMAND you draw a [1], then transfer the highest card in your hand to my hand.

Name: City States
Effect 0: I DEMAND you transfer a top card with a [Castle] from your board to my board if you have at least four [Castle] icons on your board! If you do, draw a 1!

Name: Clothing
Effect 0: Meld a card from your hand of different color from any card on your board.
Effect 1: Draw and score a 1 for each color present on your board not present on any other player’s board.

Name: Code of Laws
Effect 0: You may tuck a card from your hand of the same color as any card on your board. If you do, you may splay that color of your cards left.

Name: Domestication
Effect 0: Meld the lowest card in your hand. Draw a 1.

Name: Masonry
Effect 0: You may meld any number of cards from your hand, each with a [Castle]. If you melded four or more cards in this way, claim the Monument achievement.

Name: Metalworking
Effect 0: Draw and reveal a 1. If it has a [Castle], score it and repeat this dogma effect. Otherwise, keep it.

Name: Mysticism
Effect 0: Draw and reveal a 1. If it is the same color as any card on your board, meld it and draw a 1.

Name: Sailing
Effect 0: Draw and meld a 1

Name: The Wheel
Effect 0: Draw two 1.

Name: Writing
Effect 0: Draw a 2

Name: Calendar
Effect 0: If you have more cards in your score pile than in your hand, draw two 3.

Name: Fermenting
Effect 0: Draw a 2 for every color on your board with one or more [Leaf].

Name: Alchemy
Effect 0: Draw and reveal a 4 for every three [Castle] icons on your board. If any of the drawn cards are red, return the cards drawn and all cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.
Effect 1: Meld a card from your hand, then score a card from your hand.

Name: Anatomy
Effect 0: I DEMAND you return a card from your score pile! If you do, return a top card of equal value from your board!

Name: Colonialism
Effect 0: Draw and tuck a 3. If it has a [Crown], repeat this dogma effect.

Name: Experimentation
Effect 0: Draw and meld a 5.

Name: Astronomy
Effect 0: Draw and reveal a 6. If the card is green or blue, meld it and repeat this dogma effect.
Effect 1: If all non-purple top cards on your board are value 6 or higher, claim the Universe achievement.

Name: Steam Engine
Effect 0: Draw and tuck two 4, then score your bottom yellow card.

Name: Atomic Theory
Effect 0: You may splay your blue cards right.

Name: Machine Tools
Effect 0: Draw and score a card of value equal to the highest card in your score pile.

Name: Bicycle
Effect 0: You may exchange all the cards in your hand with all the cards in your score pile. If you exchange one, you must exchange them all.

Name: Electricity
Effect 0: Return all your top cards without a [Factory], then draw an 8 for each card you returned.

Name: Antibiotics
Effect 0: You may return up to three cards from your hand. For every different value of card that you returned, draw two 8.

Name: Collaboration
Effect 0: I demand you draw two 9 and reveal them. Transfer the card of my choice to my board, and meld the other.
Effect 1: If you have ten or more green cards on your board, you win.

Name: Genetics
Effect 0: Draw and meld a 10. Score all cards beneath it.

Name: A.I.
Effect 0: Draw and score a 10.
Effect 1: If Robotics and Software are top cards on any board, the single player with the lowest score wins.

Name: Bioengineering
Effect 0: Transfer a top card with a [Leaf] from any opponent’s board to your score pile.
Effect 1: If any player has fewer than three [Leaf] icons on their board, the single player with the most [Leaf] icons on their board wins.

Name: Databases
Effect 0: I demand you return half (rounded up) of the cards in your score pile!

Name: Robotics
Effect 0: Score your top green card. Draw and meld a 10, then execute each of its non-demand dogma effects. Do not share them.

Name: Software
Effect 0: Draw and score a 10.
Effect 1: Draw and meld two 10, then execute each of the second card’s non-demand dogma effects. Do not share them.
